product_name: Skullcandy Smokin' Buds 2 Earbuds with Microphone
long_description: The Skullcandy Smokin' Buds 2 earbuds with microphone deliver piping hot sound and smoldering tones directly to your ears with the comfort and low profile of an in-ear bud design. New, limited-distribution design features transparent, acoustic styling not found in consumer electronics stores. Supreme sound lets you experience your music the way it was meant to be heard. Take and end calls on your iOS or Android phone with the simple, one-button Mic 1 remote; it also controls play/pause/forward/back for your music tracks. Flat cord lasts longer and tangles less than round cords. Silicone gel tips come in interchangeable sizes for a custom fit in your ears. Skullcandy Smokin' Buds 2 earbuds come with a travel case that stores your earbuds in protective style.
short_description: The Skullcandy Smokin' Buds 2 earbuds with microphone deliver piping hot sound and smoldering tones directly to your ears with the comfort and low profile of an in-ear bud design.
